h3_title: Captain Lotus-Vision Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Once you take out around a third of his health, he'll teleport back near his original position, and shatter the remaining corpses as he draws power, creating a large and intricate circle of runic power behind him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Lotus-Vision.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Lotus-Vision', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Lotus-Vision' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Lotus-Vision Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once you take out around a third of his health, he'll teleport back near his original position, and shatter the remaining corpses as he draws power, creating a large and intricate circle of runic power behind him.
